explains: n. 灾难，灾祸；麻烦，困境；惨败
wordGroup: catastrophe risk 巨灾风险；特殊风险

sentences.en: From all points of view, war would be a catastrophe.
sentences.cn: 从各个方面来看，战争都会是一场灾难。

sentences.en: Early warnings of rising water levels prevented another major catastrophe.
sentences.cn: 提前发出的洪水水位上涨警报防止了又一次的重大灾害。

sentences.en: The expulsion of thousands of people represents a humanitarian catastrophe of enormous proportions.
sentences.cn: 驱逐成千上万人意味着人道主义的巨大灾难。
